CouchObject

Get Version

0.5.0

→ ‘couch_object’

What

CouchObject is a set of classes to help you talk to CouchDb with and in Ruby.

Installing

sudo gem install couchobject

The basics

Demonstration of usage

See the RDoc

How to submit patches

  $ git clone git://repo.or.cz/couchobject.git
